mapper.update: update tb_account set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_pwd = #{accountPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select account_id, account_name, account_pwd, user_address, province, city, account_type, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, del_flag from tb_account where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select account_id, account_name, account_pwd, user_address, province, city, account_type, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, del_flag from tb_account
